Game: Guru Guru Guru Guru is a 2D comical action platform game. Take control of the witch Straw and her companion Mono and try to get through the eight stages of the game. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/52a95116-b1c9-4557-abe7-5c933b169445.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/c39e7158-08de-4d94-a3f7-75d640085958.jpg
